# This file was generated by the YaTool build system (https://github.com/yandex/yatool),
# from a source YaTool build configuration provided in ya.make files.
#
# If the repository supports both CMake and ya build configurations, please modify both of them.
#
# If only CMake build configuration is supported then modify only CMake files and note that only
# simple modifications are allowed like adding source-files to targets or adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories. These modifications will be ported to original ya.make files
# by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be easily ported back to the ya build
# system may be rejected.
#
# Please refer to the build instructions in the repository for more information about manual
# changes in this file.

get_built_tool_path(
  TOOL_rescompiler_bin
  TOOL_rescompiler_dependency
  tools/rescompiler/bin
  rescompiler
)

add_subdirectory(common)
add_subdirectory(slow)
add_subdirectory(ut_with_sdk)

add_executable(ydb-core-persqueue-ut)


target_compile_options(ydb-core-persqueue-ut PRIVATE
  -DUSE_CURRENT_UDF_ABI_VERSION
)

target_include_directories(ydb-core-persqueue-ut PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/persqueue
)

target_link_libraries(ydb-core-persqueue-ut PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-linux-headers
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  cpp-testing-unittest_main
  ydb-core-persqueue
  library-cpp-getopt
  cpp-regex-pcre
  library-cpp-svnversion
  persqueue-ut-common
  core-testlib-default
  ydb_persqueue_core-ut-ut_utils
  ydb_persqueue_public-ut-ut_utils
  tx-schemeshard-ut_helpers
  library-cpp-resource
)

target_allocator(ydb-core-persqueue-ut
  cpp-malloc-jemalloc
)

target_link_options(ydb-core-persqueue-ut PRIVATE
  -ldl
  -lrt
  -Wl,--no-as-needed
  -fPIC
  -fPIC
  -lpthread
  -lrt
  -ldl
  -lutil
)

target_sources(ydb-core-persqueue-ut PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/persqueue/ut/counters_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/persqueue/ut/pqtablet_mock.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/persqueue/ut/internals_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/persqueue/ut/make_config.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/persqueue/ut/metering_sink_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/persqueue/ut/partition_chooser_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/persqueue/ut/pq_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/persqueue/ut/partition_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/persqueue/ut/partitiongraph_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/persqueue/ut/pqtablet_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/persqueue/ut/quota_tracker_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/persqueue/ut/sourceid_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/persqueue/ut/type_codecs_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/persqueue/ut/user_info_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/persqueue/ut/pqrb_describes_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/persqueue/ut/microseconds_sliding_window_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/persqueue/ut/fetch_request_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/persqueue/ut/utils_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/ydb/core/persqueue/ut/20fb34d39c23be7518eb4226481d815e.cpp
)


set_property(
  TARGET
  ydb-core-persqueue-ut
  PROPERTY
  SPLIT_FACTOR
  40
)

add_yunittest(
  NAME
  ydb-core-persqueue-ut
  TEST_TARGET
  ydb-core-persqueue-ut
  TEST_ARG
  --print-before-suite
  --print-before-test
  --fork-tests
  --print-times
  --show-fails
)

set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  ydb-core-persqueue-ut
  PROPERTY
  LABELS
  MEDIUM
)

set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  ydb-core-persqueue-ut
  PROPERTY
  ENVIRONMENT
)

set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  ydb-core-persqueue-ut
  PROPERTY
  TIMEOUT
  600
)

resources(ydb-core-persqueue-ut
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/ydb/core/persqueue/ut/20fb34d39c23be7518eb4226481d815e.cpp
  INPUTS
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/persqueue/ut/resources/counters_datastreams.html
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/persqueue/ut/resources/counters_pqproxy_firstclass.html
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/persqueue/ut/resources/counters_topics.html
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/persqueue/ut/resources/counters_pqproxy.html
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/persqueue/ut/resources/counters_labeled.json
  KEYS
  counters_datastreams.html
  counters_pqproxy_firstclass.html
  counters_topics.html
  counters_pqproxy.html
  counters_labeled.json
)

vcs_info(ydb-core-persqueue-ut)

set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  ydb-core-persqueue-ut
  PROPERTY
  PROCESSORS
  1
)
